TopicTitle: White course lines all over map - looks like a spirograph

Articles.Content:
I just started getting the whackiest lines showing up on my map view. Do these look familiar to anyone? Here are two examples. Never saw them before today. Now I'm getting them consistently.

http://imgur.com/996lj7H

http://imgur.com/8c2Fzuh

Thanks!

im not using either of those. Thanks for the idea though. 

I ended up doing a clean install and moving my save file over. The problem went away.
Well, I have no idea what causes it but I have to say, those orbits look pretty cool.
Looks almost like trajectories with both Body-fixed mode and complete enabled.  That is also the only mod I can think of that uses white on the map screen.

18 hours ago, icedown said:

Looks almost like trajectories with both Body-fixed mode and complete enabled.  That is also the only mod I can think of that uses white on the map screen.

That totally makes sense! I bet that was it. 

Thanks!
